entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:30 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -11.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 06:19 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -11.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: W 36 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
